COMMAND.name: router ospf

PARAM.name: vrf-name
PARAM.help: Name of VRF (Max size 15, prefixed by Vrf)

COMMAND.ACTION: python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py patch_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_config ${vrf-name}

COMMAND.name: no router ospf
COMMAND.ACTION: python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py delete_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global ${vrf-name}

COMMAND.name: area

PARAM.name: areaid
PARAM.help: OSPF area ID as a decimal value/IP address format

PARAM.name: default-cost
PARAM.help: Set the summary-default cost of a NSSA or stub area

PARAM.name: export-list
PARAM.help: Set the filter for networks announced to other areas

PARAM.name: in
PARAM.help: Filter networks sent to this area

PARAM.name: out
PARAM.help: Filter networks sent from this area

PARAM.name: import-list
PARAM.help: Set the filter for networks from other areas announced to the specified one

PARAM.name: range
PARAM.help: Summarize routes matching address/mask (border routers only)

PARAM.name: cost
PARAM.help: User specified metric for this range

PARAM.name: substitute
PARAM.help: Announce area range as another prefix

PARAM.name: rangenetworkprefix
PARAM.help: Network prefix to be announced instead of range

PARAM.name: no-summary
PARAM.help: Do not inject inter-area routes into stub

PARAM.name: vlinkip
PARAM.help: Router ID of the remote ABR

PARAM.name: authentication
PARAM.help: Enable authentication on this virtual link

PARAM.name: dead-interval
PARAM.help: Interval time after which a neighbor is declared down

PARAM.name: retransmit-interval
PARAM.help: Time between retransmitting lost link state advertisements

COMMAND.name: no area

PARAM.name: areaid
PARAM.help: OSPF area ID as a decimal value/IP address format

PARAM.name: default-cost
PARAM.help: Set the summary-default cost of a NSSA or stub area

PARAM.name: in

PARAM.name: out

PARAM.name: import-list
PARAM.help: Set the filter for networks from other areas announced to the specified one

PARAM.name: range
PARAM.help: Summarize routes matching address/mask (border routers only)

PARAM.name: cost
PARAM.help: User specified metric for this range

PARAM.name: substitute
PARAM.help: Announce area range as another prefix

PARAM.name: no-summary
PARAM.help: Do not inject inter-area routes into stub

PARAM.name: vlinkip
PARAM.help: Router ID of the remote ABR

PARAM.name: authentication
PARAM.help: Enable authentication on this virtual link

PARAM.name: dead-interval
PARAM.help: Interval time after which a neighbor is declared down

PARAM.name: retransmit-interval
PARAM.help: Time between retransmitting lost link state advertisements

COMMAND.name: auto-cost
COMMAND.help: Calculate OSPF interface cost according to bandwidth

PARAM.name: reference-bandwidth
PARAM.help: Use reference bandwidth method to assign OSPF cost

PARAM.name: ref-bandwidth
PARAM.help: The reference bandwidth in terms of Mbits per second

COMMAND.ACTION: python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py patch_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_config_auto_cost_reference_bandwidth ${vrf-name} ${ref-bandwidth}

COMMAND.name: no auto-cost

COMMAND.name: compatible
COMMAND.ACTION: python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py patch_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_config_ospf_rfc1583_compatible ${vrf-name}

COMMAND.name: no compatible
COMMAND.ACTION: python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py delete_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_config_ospf_rfc1583_compatible ${vrf-name}

COMMAND.name: default-information

PARAM.name: metric-type
PARAM.help: OSPF metric type for default routes

COMMAND.name: no default-information

PARAM.name: metric-type
PARAM.help: OSPF metric type for default routes

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${always}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py delete_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_route_distribution_policies_distribute_list_config_always ${vrf-name}
fi
if test "${metric}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py delete_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_route_distribution_policies_distribute_list_config_metric ${vrf-name} "default_route"
fi
if test "${metric-type}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py delete_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_route_distribution_policies_distribute_list_config_metric_type ${vrf-name} "default_route"
fi
if test "${route-map}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py delete_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_route_distribution_policies_distribute_list_config_route_map_default ${vrf-name} "default_route"
fi

COMMAND.name: max-metric

PARAM.name: router-lsa
PARAM.help: Advertise own Router-LSA with infinite distance (stub router)

PARAM.name: administrative
PARAM.help: Administratively applied, for an indefinite period

PARAM.name: on-shutdown
PARAM.help: Advertise stub-router prior to full shutdown of OSPF

PARAM.name: extdistance
PARAM.help: Time (seconds) to wait till full shutdown

PARAM.name: on-startup
PARAM.help: Automatically advertise stub Router-LSA on startup of OSPF

PARAM.name: interdistance
PARAM.help: Time (seconds) to advertise self as stub-router

COMMAND.name: no max-metric

PARAM.name: router-lsa
PARAM.help: Advertise own Router-LSA with infinite distance (stub router)

PARAM.name: administrative
PARAM.help: Administratively applied, for an indefinite period

PARAM.name: on-shutdown
PARAM.help: Advertise stub-router prior to full shutdown of OSPF

PARAM.name: on-startup
PARAM.help: Automatically advertise stub Router-LSA on startup of OSPF

COMMAND.name: redistribute
COMMAND.help: Redistribute information from another routing protocol

PARAM.name: metric-type
PARAM.help: OSPF exterior metric type for redistributed routes

PARAM.name: connected
PARAM.help: Connected routes (directly attached subnet or host)

PARAM.name: metric-type
PARAM.help: OSPF exterior metric type for redistributed routes

PARAM.name: metric-type
PARAM.help: OSPF exterior metric type for redistributed routes

PARAM.name: metric-type
PARAM.help: OSPF exterior metric type for redistributed routes

PARAM.name: kernel
PARAM.help: Kernel routes (not installed via the zebra RIB)

PARAM.name: metric-type
PARAM.help: OSPF exterior metric type for redistributed routes

COMMAND.ACTION:
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py patch_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_route_distribution_policies_distribute_list_config_export ${vrf-name} ${protocol}
if test "${protocol}" = "bgp"; then
if test "${bgpmetricval}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py patch_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_route_distribution_policies_redistribute_list_config_metric ${vrf-name} ${protocol} ${bgpmetricval}
fi
if test "${bgpmertrictype}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py patch_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_route_distribution_policies_redistribute_list_config_metric_type ${vrf-name} ${protocol} ${bgpmertrictype}
fi
if test "${bgproutemapname}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py patch_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_route_distribution_policies_redistribute_list_config_route_map ${vrf-name} ${protocol} ${bgproutemapname}
fi
fi
if test "${protocol}" = "ospf"; then
if test "${ospfmetricval}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py patch_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_route_distribution_policies_redistribute_list_config_metric ${vrf-name} ${protocol} ${ospfmetricval}
fi
if test "${ospfmertrictype}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py patch_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_route_distribution_policies_redistribute_list_config_metric_type ${vrf-name} ${protocol} ${ospfmertrictype}
fi
if test "${ospfroutemapname}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py patch_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_route_distribution_policies_redistribute_list_config_route_map ${vrf-name} ${protocol} ${ospfroutemapname}
fi
fi
if test "${protocol}" = "static"; then
if test "${staticmetricval}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py patch_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_route_distribution_policies_redistribute_list_config_metric ${vrf-name} ${protocol} ${staticmetricval}
fi
if test "${staticmertrictype}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py patch_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_route_distribution_policies_redistribute_list_config_metric_type ${vrf-name} ${protocol} ${staticmertrictype}
fi
if test "${staticroutemapname}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py patch_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_route_distribution_policies_redistribute_list_config_route_map ${vrf-name} ${protocol} ${staticroutemapname}
fi
fi
if test "${protocol}" = "connected"; then
if test "${connmetricval}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py patch_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_route_distribution_policies_redistribute_list_config_metric ${vrf-name} ${protocol} ${connmetricval}
fi
if test "${connmertrictype}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py patch_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_route_distribution_policies_redistribute_list_config_metric_type ${vrf-name} ${protocol} ${connmertrictype}
fi
if test "${connroutemapname}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py patch_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_route_distribution_policies_redistribute_list_config_route_map ${vrf-name} ${protocol} ${connroutemapname}
fi
fi
if test "${protocol}" = "kernel"; then
if test "${kernelmetricval}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py patch_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_route_distribution_policies_redistribute_list_config_metric ${vrf-name} ${protocol} ${kernelmetricval}
fi
if test "${kernelmertrictype}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py patch_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_route_distribution_policies_redistribute_list_config_metric_type ${vrf-name} ${protocol} ${kernelmertrictype}
fi
if test "${kernelroutemapname}" != ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-ospfv2.py patch_openconfig_ospfv2_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_ospfv2_global_route_distribution_policies_redistribute_list_config_route_map ${vrf-name} ${protocol} ${kernelroutemapname}
fi
fi

PARAM.name: lsid
PARAM.help: Link State ID (as an IP address)

PARAM.name: lsid
PARAM.help: Link State ID (as an IP address)

EXAMPLE.summary: Display ospf information for all vrf

DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: device# show ip ospf OSPF Routing Process, Router ID: 1.1.1.1 Supports only single TOS (TOS0) routes This implementation conforms to RFC2328 RFC1583Compatibility flag is enabled OpaqueCapability flag is disabled Initial SPF scheduling delay 0 millisec(s) Minimum hold time between consecutive SPFs 50 millisec(s) Maximum hold time between consecutive SPFs 5000 millisec(s) Hold time multiplier is currently 1 time is 92031756 SPF algorithm last executed 1065d4h22m ago Last SPF duration 0.0s SPF timer is inactive LSA minimum interval 5000 msecs LSA minimum arrival 1000 msecs Write Multiplier set to 20 Refresh timer 10 secs Number of external LSA 0. Checksum Sum 0x0 Number of opaque AS LSA 0. Checksum Sum 0x0 Number of areas attached to this router: 2 Area ID: 0.0.0.0 (Backbone) Number of interfaces in this area: Total: 1 , Active: 1 Number of fully adjacent neighbors in this area: 1 Area has no authentication SPF algorithm executed 8 times Number of LSA 3 Number of router LSA 2. Checksum Sum 0x40f64b4000000000 Number of network LSA 1. Checksum Sum 0x40d5adc000000000 Number of summary LSA 0. Checksum Sum 0x0 Number of ASBR summary LSA 0. Checksum Sum 0x0 Number of NSSA LSA 0. Checksum Sum 0x0 Number of opaque link LSA . Checksum Sum 0x Number of opaque area LSA 0. Checksum Sum 0x0 Area ID: 0.0.0.1 Number of interfaces in this area: Total: 1 , Active: 1 Number of fully adjacent neighbors in this area: 0 Area has no authentication SPF algorithm executed 1 times Number of LSA 2 Number of router LSA 0. Checksum Sum 0x0 Number of network LSA 0. Checksum Sum 0x0 Number of summary LSA 2. Checksum Sum 0x40f1f61000000000 Number of ASBR summary LSA 0. Checksum Sum 0x0 Number of NSSA LSA 0. Checksum Sum 0x0 Number of opaque link LSA . Checksum Sum 0x Number of opaque area LSA 0. Checksum Sum 0x0

COMMAND.name: show ip ospf route
COMMAND.ACTION: python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-show-ospfv2.py show_ip_ospf_route show_ip_ospf_route.j2 default
